document.title: Third Program Visualization Workshop 1 Enhanced Expressiveness in Scripting Using AnimalScript V2
document.abstract: One of the many different approaches for generating algorithm or program visualization content (abbreviated “AV ” for the rest of this paper) is scripting. Here, the user provides a simple ASCII file containing commands that steer the visualization. Typically, the commands are held in plain English to make using the underlying scripting language easier. Typical
